info.additionalInfo: as the wiki gives the users full control over the aspects, it is difficult to find something that fits for every page. But i will try to fix the errors as i see them coming in. namely bright backgrounds without specific mention of dark text colours and vice versa gives issues. currently only fixed for pure white backgrounds and pure black text. mostly.
